title: Vijay Hazare Trophy:Abhimanyu Mithun Grabs 5, Mayank Agarwal And KL Rahul Hit 50s As Karnataka Lift Vijay Hazare Trophy
text:
KL Rahul produced a fifty while Abhimanyu Mithun took a hat-trick as Karnataka lifted the Vijay Hazare Trophy, beating Tamil Nadu by 60 runs in a rain-hit final.

Mithun took 5/34 as Tamil Nadu made 252.

WATCH: Excellent last over by birthday boy Abhimanyu Mithun to get a hat-trick against Tamil Nadu in the #VijayHazare Trophy Final 🔥🔥 #KARvTN @Paytmhttps://t.co/X1poAwqaYv — BCCI Domestic (@BCCIdomestic) October 25, 2019

Rahul lost fellow opener Devdutt Paddikal (11) early but put on 112 runs with Mayank Agarwal for the second wicket.

BCCL

Karnataka won by the VJD method (used in domestic cricket in rain-affected games).

Karnataka captain Manish Pandey was over the moon.

"We are very happy with the results. The mindset of the boys is they want to win every match they play. Hopefully we will continue doing well," he said.

Don't Miss 55.5 K SHARES 16.6 K SHARES 14 K SHARES 9.1 K SHARES

Tamil Nadu skipper Dinesh Karthik was satisfied with the wat his side played in the tournament.

"I think we played terrific cricket, one bad day doesn't make a bad team. This should give confidence going into the T20s and the Ranji Trophy," he said.

With Inputs From PTI.

Vijay Hazare Trophy Mithun took 5/34 as Tamil Nadu made 252.
